title: Family follies

description: Uses a humorous skit with dances, songs, and production numbers in order to highlight the problems which trouble young people: communication with parents, developing responsibility and independence from parents, and learning to cope with competitive attitudes in the family. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
